etymons.notes: mlḥ. Cf. SL 766 mlḥ (I): to sprinkle salt; Cf.
767 melḥā which is probably better, because the verb is in the second stem?

Infectum-wa.turoyo: Saymiwa qaliyat w kəsdiwo u baṣro, mmalḥiwole, tulanwole bad dane qaliyat
translations: and pickle (?) the meat, salt it and then put it in containers' (QM 2461)
